description:
Nami wakes up just in time to find out she’s about to marry a zombie, but the special occasion is interrupted by a very jealous warthog!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taorero Absalom!! Nami Yuujou no Raigeki!!
Vaincre Absalom par amitié ! Le coup de foudre de Nami !
You`re Going Down, Absalom!! Nami`s Lightning Attack of Friendship!!
Абсалом в нокауте!! Нами, дружба и разряд молнии!!
倒れろアブサロム!! ナミ友情の雷撃!!
